title: Don't Sit Under the Grits Tree With Anyone Else But Me
description: More down-home humor from Lewis Grizzard. Ruminations on lardbutts. bra-padders. Good ol'boys and giggling Yankee girls. The joys of white bread and knowing your way around a 1957 Chevrolet. And lots more from one of America's favorite writers.
author: Lewis Grizzard
